Key Match Events: Mikel Merino scored a goal in extra time to give Spain a 2-1 win over Germany
Dani Carvajal received a second yellow card for a bad foul in extra time
Post-Match Reflections: Toni Kroos' decision to retire from international football after the tournament was announced
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the MHPArena in Stuttgart, Germany with an attendance of 54,000
The match was broadcast on FOX
Others: Spain eliminated the hosts Germany in the quarterfinals of the 2024 European Championship
The match went to extra time with Spain winning 2-1
